rules.name: YesNoOmni
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11
rules.label: YesNoOmni

rules.name: yesPTA_0
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10
rules.label: yes180

rules.name: PTA_minutes
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4)
rules.label: PTA minutes

rules.name: yes_Disp
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7) AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12
rules.label: yes Disp

rules.name: Unspotted_Queue_8_Min
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR (2 AND 3)) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8
rules.label: Unspotted Queue
